Chuck Todd is NBC News' chief political analyst. He's the former moderator of the network's flagship Sunday public affairs program Meet the Press.
Chuck Todd was born on April 8, 1972 in Miami, Florida, USA. He is a writer and actor, known for Heads of State (2025), NBC Nightly News with Tom Llamas ...
